title: Bill passes to allow removal of blue lights from Georgia trooper cars

title: Georgia lawmakers approve divisive concepts, transgender sports bill
Public college costs to fall in Georgia as fee goes away

sentence: Today, Republican voters in Georgia will decide a marquee primary contest for governor between incumbent Brian Kemp and former U.S. senator David Perdue, an election that could be a big setback for former president Donald Trump as he tries to play GOP kingmaker.
author: Mariana Alfaro
title: Primary elections live updates Big races are on the ballot in Georgia, Alabama, Arkansas and Texas
